oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Song, "I'll dream of thee no more"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Original song, "I'll dream of thee no more," written by 1st Lt. Joseph N. B. Lusk, Co. L, 1st Tenn. Cav., USA, to his sweetheart, Adaline Davis. Lusk and Davis married after the war, in February 1866. Lusk initially joined the Confederate army but he and; his brothers deserted and joined the Union army. Lusk and Davis lived in Bradley County, Tenn. after the war.
